content: sts before m k2tog slm ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog decrease round 2 k all now work decrease round 1 until you have 5 6 7 sts on the inside of the mitten and 6 7 8 sts on the outside next round ssk k2 k2tog slm ssk k2tog k1 k2tog the numbers now add up 3 4 5 sts between each stitch marker m+l work an additional decrease round = 4 6 sts in total all cut the yarn and thread the end through the remaining stitches twice and pull taut weave in the ends make thumb both alike slip the thumb stitches onto 2 dpn needles fairly evenly divided with working yarn and a third dpn needle knit across all 9 9 11 sts and pick up 2 stitches in the gap between thumb gore and palm = 11 11 13 sts next round k 9 9 11 skpo k2tog = 10 10 12 sts knit all rounds until thumb measures 5 6 6 5 cm/2 2 3 2 5 from gap following rounds *k2tog* all sts until there are 5 5 6 remaining sts cut the yarn and thread the end through the remaining stitches twice and pull taut weave in the ends finishing soak in lukewarm water with a small amount schampoo or wool detergent rinse squeeze the excess water gently per hand and roll the mittens in a towel step on the towel for a few seconds then let the mittens dry flat wear with pride and joy j if you re pleased with your mittens -­ do post on instagram and hashtag #omalenismittens @gralinaknit pattern and photos are © gralina frie 2016 this pattern is for personal and not-profit use
